thread.title: Brigador hitting Steam Early Access early, launching October 16
thread.title_full: Brigador hitting Steam Early Access early, launching October 16

author: News Zombie
title: Brigador hitting Steam Early Access early, launching October 16
text:
Posted on October 9, 2015 in PC News 
Stellar Jockeys’ mech-blasting action title Brigador will be debuting on Steam Early Access next week, on October 16. Launching four days early, the Early Access version will feature six playable characters, nine levels, 18 weapons, and destructible environments. No longer escaping from Solo Nobre, players will now lead one of three factions in a fight to control the city. 
Brigador will be available through Steam Early Access on October 16 for Linux, Mac, and Windows PC. 
–
